title: Basement apartment for rent
map_address: Old Keith Bridge Road near Bay Hill Drive
posting_body: Large one bedroom apartment, Located on Lake Lanier, one mile from Keith Bridge park, quiet upscale neighborhood, at the end of a cul-de-sac.
Big walk in closet, living room and kitchen have hardwood floors.
Ten foot high ceilings, bright clean and safe for one person only.
Separate entrance, off street parking for one small vehicle.
When the apartment is taken, I will promptly remove the ad.
Added note: The hardwood floors are real wood - sorry, no pets!
Pet urine ruins real hardwood floors.
The apartment is for one person only.
